definitions.body: :Ex 12:16 convocation; convoking, reading;—´[[מ]]: abs. Is 1:13, Ne 8:8; cstr Ex 12:16 +; pl. cstr. [[מִקְרָאֵי]] Le 23:2 +; sf. [[מִקְרָאֶהָ]] (Ges:§ 91 k) Is 4:5;—

convocation, sacred assembly Is 1:13 (after [[קְרׂא]]), Is 4:5; usu. explicitly [[קׂדֶשׁ]] ´[[מ]]:, term. techn. in P for religious gathering on Sabbath and certain sacred days, Ex 12:16, Ex 12:16 + 14 t. Le 23, Nu 28, Nu 29, + (pl.) Le 23:2, Le 23:4, Le 23:37.
(n. verbi, as Aram. Inf., Ges:§ 45 e, cf. 115 d) convoking, [[הָעֵדָה]] ´[[מ]]: Nu 10:2
